      • nextContent

        protected ByteBuffer nextContent()
                          throws IOException
        Description copied from class: HttpInput
        Access the next content to be consumed from. Returning the next item does not consume it and it may be returned multiple times until it is consumed.

        Calls to HttpInput.get(Object, byte[], int, int) or HttpInput.consume(Object, int) are required to consume data from the content.

        Specified by:
        nextContent in class HttpInput<ByteBuffer>
        Returns:
        the content or null if none available.
        Throws:
        IOException - if retrieving the content fails
